description: An advanced treatment of topical areas of international and Australian Copyright Law, including the Internet Service Provider and internet user liability; ownership of commissioned works; the copyright/designs overlap; remedies; moral rights; interface with trade practices law.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24), MICLaw
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
